tool.name: qiime2 phylogeny raxml
tool.description: Construct a phylogenetic tree with RAxML.

param.name: alignment
param.label: alignment: FeatureData[AlignedSequence]
param.help: [required] Aligned sequences to be used for phylogenetic reconstruction.

param.name: seed
param.label: seed: Int
param.help: [optional] Random number seed for the parsimony starting tree. This allows you to reproduce tree results. If not supplied then one will be randomly chosen.

param.name: n_searches
param.label: n_searches: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 1] The number of independent maximum likelihood searches to perform. The single best scoring tree is returned.

param.name: n_threads
param.label: n_threads: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 1] The number of threads to use for multithreaded processing. Using more than one thread will enable the PTHREADS version of RAxML.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: phylogeny raxml ======================== Construct a phylogenetic tree with RAxML.
Outputs: -------- :tree.qza: The resulting phylogenetic tree.
|
Description: ------------ Construct a phylogenetic tree with RAxML. See: https://sco.h-its.org/exelixis/web/software/raxml/
|
